Description:
A Vision Realised
Tastefully refurbished weatherboard
4 bedrooms, ceiling fans to three, robes to one
Study
New floor coverings and paint throughout
2 x new split systems
Dining/2nd living area
Kitchen – sky light, dishwasher, gas hotplates, electric under bench oven, range hood, granite benchtop
Bathroom – fully updated, cedar feature wall, shower, toilet, vanity, bath, colour change LED strip lighting
Separate toilet
Linen press
Laundry – trough
Gas boosted solar hot water, evacuated tubes
Solar panels 5kw
Single garage – concrete floor and power
6m x 12m shed – concrete floor and power, accessible via two roller doors
Large family home set on approximately 1100m2 corner block. All the hard work has been done, ready for you to move in and enjoy. With the benefit of copious amounts of Kitchen cupboards, you’ll move with ease whilst you create family feasts in the updated Kitchen. Soak it all up in the tub and set the mood by choosing your own colour theme of LED lighting, cleverly concealed in ceiling, wall niches and under wall hung vanity. Four bedrooms and a study, with option to set up two living areas. Terrific shedding completes this tidy, well thought out package.

Address: 200 Mackenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Neat and tidy 3 bedroom BV home
Deceiving from the street this solidly-built 3 bedroom brick veneer home is surprisingly spacious once you get inside. The modern grey tones make this home feel bright and airy. Updated kitchen in the hub of the home looks out to the privately enclosed, grassed backyard which has a small garden shed.
The bathroom also has been modernised and is off the master, with dual access for convenience for the rest of the family to utilise.
Set on an easy to manage block of 438m2, the home is so neat and tidy, and would be perfect for a first home buyer, investor or even a retiree, with ample side access for a caravan, boat or a second car to store. These well-built homes don't come up very often so it's definitely worth an inspection.
Close to public transport, supermarkets, schools, fish and chip shop and convenience stores.

Description:
So Fresh & So Clean!
Externally it's as solid as the day it was built, but internally this brick veneer unit has been updated to give it a contemporary feel. Located only a stone's throw from Kangaroo Flat's main shopping strip and a great supermarket, this unit is ready for you to move in to, or to hold as an investment.
Having been completely decked out in vinyl plank flooring, this unit feels light, bright & airy. A recently updated and tastefully neutral kitchen includes plenty of storage space, electric cooking, and the convenience of a dishwasher. Both bedrooms include built-in-robes and large windows. Live comfortably and enjoy the control over climate you have with a Rinnai gas heater, wall air-conditioner, and ducted cooling throughout the property. The large lounge area has room for your sofa, TV and dining table, and enjoys sunlight during the coldest months of the year. A three-piece bathroom includes a shower which sits separately from the bath, and an updated vanity. Access to the toilet is provided by walking through the bathroom or through the functional sized laundry. Stepping into the private and well-fenced (with as-new Colorbond) backyard of the unit you will find an established and low-maintenance courtyard which includes an undercover area, and twice the utility with TWO clotheslines. A remote control single-car garage provides you with safe storage of your car (which you will be able to leave there since everything is handy walking distance!)
The complex the unit sits within is peaceful and extremely well-maintained. Beside the unit, a huge lawn area with established trees provides the perfect place to socialise with your neighbours or simply relax in the shade with a book. Don't stress if gardening isn't your hobby - a gardener takes care of this area for you!
This property would suit anybody considering downsizing, or looking for their first home. It would also make an ideal investment proposition, with an expected rental return of up to $270 per week.
Don't miss out on this immaculate unit. Contact now for further information or to arrange an inspection!

Description:
BRICK HOME PERFECT FOR SMALL FAMILY OR FIRST HOME
Sitting on the quiet service lane of Lockwood Road is this lovely 3-bedroom Brick Veneer home on a 775m2 Block.
Throughout the home is fresh new carpet with the bedrooms having Built in Robes, the master having a his and hers. With 1 neat bright bathroom servicing the home. Plenty of room to entertain with 2 living areas and dining opening up to the covered patio area where you can sit and enjoy the big yard.
Don't worry the man of the house will be happy with the side access and the powered 3x6m large shed out the back to give him his tinkering space. The home has newly added ducted heating and cooling throughout as well as ceiling fans in each bedroom for the comfort in any climate. Close to Kangaroo Flat CBD, shopping, hotels, schools and Crusoe Reservoir. At this affordable price this nice neat home is a definite to inspect.

Address: 3 St Johns Close Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Fantastic 4 bedroom family home
Set in a quiet court handy to both Golden Square shopping and Kangaroo Flat schools and shopping. This newly renovated 4 bedroom, double brick home offers loads of space with three separate living areas, style and comfort for all. Boasting a recently fully renovated kitchen with new appliances, renovated bathroom and ensuite, new flooring and fresh paint throughout, the hard work is already done for you just have to move in. The formal lounge features vaulted ceilings and a gas log fire in the feature chimney brickwork. Main bedroom with ensuite, all bedrooms with built-in robe and ceiling fans. Outside finds a very spacious alfresco with plenty of backyard for the kids and excellent fencing, a 6x7m colorbond shed with concrete and power, together with 2 car carport and drive through access to the back yard and of off street parking for 4 cars.

Description:
Ideal for all Investors!
Centrally located to all amenities is this low maintenance modern townhouse with a fantastic tenant already in place until April 2019. This property is currently returning $330 per week making it an attractive option for all investors.
This property comprises of 3 carpeted bedrooms, the main offering a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms both have built in robes. To the front of the home you will find the large open plan kitchen/living area. The kitchen has ample cupboard space, gas cooktop, electric wall oven and a dishwasher. There is ducted heating and cooling throughout.
With a low maintenance courtyard and a double lock up garage this property offers everything you will need!
Set only a short drive to Lansell Square Shopping centre with K-Mart, Cotton On, Woolworths, Coles, Cafes and the Post Office. Also just a short walk to the Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing centre - the newly built swimming pool and the Rotary Park Lake.
Contact the agent today for more information!

Description:
CREME OF DE CREME – THE BEST OF THE BEST
They just don’t build them like this anymore this classic cream brick veneer is a renovator’s delight. Built to last, the home has been with the one family for many years. Walk in and you will see the potential. If you are looking for a project this is it!
Situated on a corner block with two street access on approx 605m2 it is not expected this home will last long. Features include extra large bedrooms and spacious entrance with old style French doors leading to large lounge, formal dining and separate kitchen.
The back yard is neat in size and full of potential. Side access from the front leads through to the garden gate to fernery and small sleep out/study room. The brick double garage is situated perfectly on the block; right beside this, there is potential for another area for a car or caravan trailer etc.
Positioned in one of Bendigo’s most popular suburbs due to its central location Golden Square is only 10 minutes in either direction for all your shopping essentials.
For a personal Inspection Contact Rod Jones 0428 444 882
* all sizes are approximate only. Land size is to be confirmed. Buyers due diligence checklist https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Comfort and convenience plus.
Two-bedroom, brick veneer unit perfect for investors, singles or first-home buyers is conveniently located just one block from the Kangaroo Flat shopping strip and public transport.
Both bedrooms have built-in robes, the expansive open-plan living, meals and kitchen is filled with natural light while ducted heating and a split system air conditioning unit maintain comfort levels.
The kitchen is equipped with the popular combination of gas hotplates and electric under-bench oven, dishwasher and island breakfast bar for casual meals.
Three piece bathroom, separate toilet and clever European style laundry hidden away behind double doors complete the inside.
The property is very low maintenance inside and out with clean bitumen driveway, landscaped surrounds and fully-fenced rear yard with access from the single lock-up garage.
Currently leased at $250.00 per week.

Description:
SOLID CREAM BRICK - LOW MAINTENANCE
This solid cream brick home has undergone some interior refurbishment including a new kitchen, carpet and paint, polished timber boards and ducted cooling to make for a pleasant surprise when you enter. On a corner block only one kilometre from the Kangaroo Flat supermarkets and shops and to bushland in the other direction.
Boasting three bedrooms – main and second bedroom with built in robes. The large light filled lounge is carpeted and serviced by the ducted cooling as are the bedrooms, there is a wall furnace in the hall and gas heater in the lounge to take care of temperature control. The updated kitchen includes a walk in pantry, polished timber floor boards, dishwasher and electric oven with gas hotplates. The meals area in the kitchen has room for a family sized table. The bathroom boasts a shower, vanity and full bath, the separate toilet comes off the laundry situated near the back entry.
There is plenty of space in the front yard and the brand new single carport with a fully fenced compact back yard, it is a very solid home with new Colorbond fencing, Terracotta tiled roof. Ideal for someone wanting something brick and solid without the price tag in a very handy spot to all Kangaroo Flat has to offer.

Description:
Ideal For The First Homebuyer or Investor!
This 3 bedroom brick veneer residence with tiled roof is in a highly sought after position in Kangaroo Flat, close to public transport, childcare, primary & secondary schools, shopping centres, entertainment & recreational areas, Bunnings & Harvey Norman . Description:
Invigorate and decorate to add value.
Liveable and affordable home situated in a quiet court on the Melbourne side of Bendigo with the potential to be the ideal first home, downsizer or investment property.
It features four bedrooms (or three and a large study/playroom), two bathrooms, open-plan living room with gas log fire adjoining the dining area and kitchen equipped with gas cooktop, electric wall oven, corner pantry and breakfast bar.
The main bedroom, separately located off the entry, includes a walk-in robe and ensuite while remaining bedrooms share a wing with the main bathroom, laundry and WC.
Sliding doors from the dining area open to a paved outdoor living area and terraced backyard with garden shed, secure dog run, and a gate to the State Forest bush reserve over the back fence – perfect for walking the dog.
Low-maintenance landscaping to the front, good Colorbond fencing all around and side access for caravan or boat/trailer storage, ample vehicular parking on the opposite side all in a handy position close to public transport and shopping centres.
Excellent starter home, improver or investment property that already includes ducted air conditioning and ceiling fans. With a lick of fresh paint and a weekend in the garden, this home will be better value than ever.

Description:
Affordable living one block from everything.
Tidy two-bedroom unit neatly hidden away in a quiet little street yet only one block from the action. It's a short walk to Kangaroo Flat shops, the new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre, convenience store, doctor, Rotary Park, Bendigo Linear Walking track and public transport.
The shaded front verandah opens to a spacious open-plan living room, dining and kitchen equipped with gas cooking, island bench/breakfast bar and sink overlooking the secure backyard.
Both bedrooms have built in robes and easy access to the central bathroom while the separate laundry opens to the backyard. Good floor coverings, paintwork and updated kitchen cabinetry.
Shady, low maintenance garden, double carport and private rear yard with garden shed and bike shelter.
Affordable hideaway for pensioners or grey nomads needing a home base; downsizers; first home owners or investors – it has a long, solid rental history but is offered with vacant possession.

Description:
Affordable hidden oasis
Set in a quiet street behind a private wall, sits this lovely brick veneer home on a decent sized block of 755m2.
Surrounded by established trees, it feels like it is in its own little oasis in the heart of Kangaroo Flat.
With vaulted ceilings in the main part of the home and split levels, this isn't just your average home.
Established as three bedrooms + study, with an open-plan kitchen/meals area and separate lounge, however the study easily converts to a 4th bedroom if need be.
The master bedroom has built-in robes and ensuite, and the main bathroom and kitchen are both neat and tidy.
The home offers wall coolers for the hotter months and a wood heater in the family/dining plus a wall furnace heater in the lounge.
Outside finds a chlorinated in-ground swimming pool, a variety of entertaining areas, secure yards with side access to the rear, plus storage shed and carport that runs the whole length of the house.
Backing onto the creek the feeling of privacy is transparent with no neighbours behind you.
These unique homes don't come up very often, an inspection won't disappoint.
Close to public transport, takeaway shops, parks and shopping.
Insights: 17 Beverley Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet Court Living and Central to Everything
Ideally located in a quiet cul-de-sac, this charming three-bedroom brick home has been looked after with such love and care, it presents immaculately.
Offering timeless neutral toned interiors, timber style flooring and soft carpets throughout, the inviting living spaces include a large living room and an open plan kitchen, meals and family area. Perfectly positioned to watch over the family whilst preparing meals, the generous kitchen comes with quality appliances including a Fisher&Paykel 4-burner gas cooktop/oven plus a dishwasher double wall pantry and plenty of storage space.
Also on offer are three bedrooms; the spacious master bedroom features a reverse cycle split system and built-in robes whilst bedroom two also has built-in robes, bedroom three without robes but has a ceiling fan for comfort. All bedrooms share the great sized central bathroom with a separate toilet. Additional highlights include a huge laundry with external access, reverse cycle split system and gas log fire in the main living zone, double lock up garage, side access for caravan or boat plus a garden shed.
If you love to entertain or simply adore having your morning cuppa outside you will absolutely love the private decking that overlooks the immaculate backyard garden that's enclosed by a screened hedge and has glass sliding door access to the inside living area.
Walking distance to local primary schools/childcare and medical facilities, you're also a 15-minute walk to the awesome new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre and only minutes away from major supermarkets, it really is the perfect place to set up and stay!
Whether you are a family on the move, first homeowner or perhaps an investor (expected rental returns of $320-330 per week) this neat and tidy is an absolute gem and is even nicer in person!
Insights: 9 Landy Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Be close to everything!
Located in the fantastic Lakeside Park Estate which is close to Schools, Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Medical Facilities, transportation and Sports& Recreational Reserves this block of land is a terrific place to build!
Set only 1 hour & 40 mins from Melbourne CBD! With a large frontage this lot is sure to be popular. Contact our office today for further information!

Description:
A Place to Call Home
This 3 bedroom weatherboard home is a must see! Situated on a great sized allotment with a shed. And fantastic deck area for entertaining guests.
Inside features:
• 3 bedrooms, main with WIR & 2nd with BIR.
• Kitchen with dining area.
• Butler’s pantry/laundry off kitchen.
• Large Lounge with picture window.
• Central bathroom with shower and bath.
• Ducted gas heating and ducted cooling.
• Polished timber floor boards throughout.
• Re-stumped in 2017.
• Large outdoor timber decked entertaining area.
Outside features:
• Single garage & Double carport.
• Good size backyard.
• Established lawns & gardens.
Text the word “wireless” to 0488 810 392 for the section 32 document

Description:
RETIREMENT LIVING AT ITS BEST!
Are you thinking of downsizing? Well consider this well presented 2 bedroom plus a handy study unit in the Aviva Communities Village at Karinya Gardens in Kangaroo Flat.
You will be surprised by how spacious this unit is! Made for low maintenance lifestyle for the over 55's, the large, light filled, open plan kitchen/dining/living is well equipped with electric wall oven, gas cooktop, plenty of cupboards & bench space & big island bench with breakfast bar. The adjacent dining area easily caters for your dining table, a glass sliding door provides access to the covered alfresco/outdoor dining deck. A good-sized carpeted lounge completes this space.
Both bedrooms have built in robes & ceiling fans, whilst the bathroom has an oversized shower & vanity. There is a separate toilet for your convenience. Other internal features are study/craft room with built in desk and cupboards, easy care timber look vinyl flooring, great storage, ducted gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling, split system and ceiling fans.
Moving outside finds an alfresco deck, with bistro blinds, perfect for outdoor dining, 2 garden sheds for extra storage and a single carport. There is a ramp to the front door for easy access.
Set in a quiet street with facilities such as Community Centre with lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, pool, gym, cinema, workshop/woodworking room & indoor/outdoor bowling green. There is also onsite storage for the boat, caravan, etc.
Close to Lansell Square Shopping Centre for all your shopping needs and transport out the front.
Call today to arrange your inspection.
